mn106:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kurusu viharati kammasadhammam nama kurunam nigamo.
mn106:2.3: Ye ca ditthadhammika kama, ye ca samparayika kama;
mn106:2.4: ya ca ditthadhammika kamasanna, ya ca samparayika kamasanna—
mn106:2.5: ubhayametam maradheyyam, marassesa visayo, marassesa nivapo, marassesa gocaro.
mn106:2.6: Etthete papaka akusala manasa abhijjhapi byapadapi sarambhapi samvattanti.
mn106:3.2: ‘ye ca ditthadhammika kama, ye ca samparayika kama;
mn106:3.3: ya ca ditthadhammika kamasanna, ya ca samparayika kamasanna—
mn106:3.4: ubhayametam maradheyyam, marassesa visayo, marassesa nivapo, marassesa gocaro.
mn106:3.5: Etthete papaka akusala manasa abhijjhapi byapadapi sarambhapi samvattanti,
mn106:3.7: Yannunaham vipulena mahaggatena cetasa vihareyyam abhibhuyya lokam adhitthaya manasa.
mn106:3.8: Vipulena hi me mahaggatena cetasa viharato abhibhuyya lokam adhitthaya manasa ye papaka akusala manasa abhijjhapi byapadapi sarambhapi te na bhavissanti.
mn106:3.9: Tesam pahana aparittanca me cittam bhavissati appamanam subhavitan’ti.
mn106:3.10: Tassa evampatipannassa tabbahulaviharino ayatane cittam pasidati.
mn106:3.11: Sampasade sati etarahi va anenjam samapajjati pannaya va adhimuccati.
mn106:3.12: Kayassa bheda param marana, thanametam vijjati yam tamsamvattanikam vinnanam assa anenjupagam.
mn106:3.13: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathama anenjasappaya patipada akkhayati.
mn106:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako iti patisancikkhati:
mn106:4.2: ‘ye ca ditthadhammika kama, ye ca samparayika kama;
mn106:4.3: ya ca ditthadhammika kamasanna, ya ca samparayika kamasanna;
mn106:4.4: yam kinci rupam sabbam rupam cattari ca mahabhutani, catunnanca mahabhutanam upadayarupan’ti.
mn106:4.5: Tassa evampatipannassa tabbahulaviharino ayatane cittam pasidati.
mn106:4.6: Sampasade sati etarahi va anenjam samapajjati pannaya va adhimuccati.
mn106:4.7: Kayassa bheda param marana, thanametam vijjati yam tamsamvattanikam vinnanam assa anenjupagam.
mn106:4.8: Ayam, bhikkhave, dutiya anenjasappaya patipada akkhayati.
mn106:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako iti patisancikkhati:
mn106:5.2: ‘ye ca ditthadhammika kama, ye ca samparayika kama;
mn106:5.3: ya ca ditthadhammika kamasanna, ya ca samparayika kamasanna;
mn106:5.4: ye ca ditthadhammika rupa, ye ca samparayika rupa;
mn106:5.5: ya ca ditthadhammika rupasanna, ya ca samparayika rupasanna—
mn106:5.7: Yadaniccam tam nalam abhinanditum, nalam abhivaditum, nalam ajjhositun’ti.
mn106:5.8: Tassa evampatipannassa tabbahulaviharino ayatane cittam pasidati.
mn106:5.9: Sampasade sati etarahi va anenjam samapajjati pannaya va adhimuccati.
mn106:5.10: Kayassa bheda param marana, thanametam vijjati yam tamsamvattanikam vinnanam assa anenjupagam.
mn106:5.11: Ayam, bhikkhave, tatiya anenjasappaya patipada akkhayati.
mn106:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako iti patisancikkhati:
mn106:6.2: ‘ye ca ditthadhammika kama, ye ca samparayika kama;
mn106:6.3: ya ca ditthadhammika kamasanna, ya ca samparayika kamasanna;
mn106:6.4: ye ca ditthadhammika rupa, ye ca samparayika rupa;
mn106:6.5: ya ca ditthadhammika rupasanna, ya ca samparayika rupasanna;
mn106:6.8: Yattheta aparisesa nirujjhanti etam santam etam panitam—
mn106:6.10: Tassa evampatipannassa tabbahulaviharino ayatane cittam pasidati.
mn106:6.11: Sampasade sati etarahi va akincannayatanam samapajjati pannaya va adhimuccati.
mn106:6.12: Kayassa bheda param marana, thanametam vijjati yam tamsamvattanikam vinnanam assa akincannayatanupagam.
mn106:6.13: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathama akincannayatanasappaya patipada akkhayati.
mn106:7.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va iti patisancikkhati:
mn106:7.3: Tassa evampatipannassa tabbahulaviharino ayatane cittam pasidati.
mn106:7.4: Sampasade sati etarahi va akincannayatanam samapajjati pannaya va adhimuccati.
mn106:7.5: Kayassa bheda param marana, thanametam vijjati yam tamsamvattanikam vinnanam assa akincannayatanupagam.
mn106:7.6: Ayam, bhikkhave, dutiya akincannayatanasappaya patipada akkhayati.
mn106:8.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako iti patisancikkhati:
mn106:8.2: ‘naham kvacani kassaci kincanatasmim, na ca mama kvacani kisminci kincanam natthi’ti.
mn106:8.3: Tassa evampatipannassa tabbahulaviharino ayatane cittam pasidati.
mn106:8.4: Sampasade sati etarahi va akincannayatanam samapajjati pannaya va adhimuccati.
mn106:8.5: Kayassa bheda param marana, thanametam vijjati yam tamsamvattanikam vinnanam assa akincannayatanupagam.
mn106:8.6: Ayam, bhikkhave, tatiya akincannayatanasappaya patipada akkhayati.
mn106:9.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako iti patisancikkhati:
mn106:9.2: ‘ye ca ditthadhammika kama, ye ca samparayika kama;
mn106:9.3: ya ca ditthadhammika kamasanna, ya ca samparayika kamasanna;
mn106:9.4: ye ca ditthadhammika rupa, ye ca samparayika rupa;
mn106:9.5: ya ca ditthadhammika rupasanna, ya ca samparayika rupasanna;
mn106:9.6: ya ca anenjasanna, ya ca akincannayatanasanna—
mn106:9.8: Yattheta aparisesa nirujjhanti etam santam etam panitam—
mn106:9.10: Tassa evampatipannassa tabbahulaviharino ayatane cittam pasidati.
mn106:9.11: Sampasade sati etarahi va nevasannanasannayatanam samapajjati pannaya va adhimuccati.
mn106:9.12: Kayassa bheda param marana, thanametam vijjati yam tamsamvattanikam vinnanam assa nevasannanasannayatanupagam.
mn106:10.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn106:10.3: ‘no cassa, no ca me siya; na bhavissati, na me bhavissati; yadatthi yam, bhutam—tam pajahami’ti.
mn106:10.5: Parinibbayeyya nu kho so, bhante, bhikkhu na va parinibbayeyya”ti?
mn106:10.6: “Apetthekacco, ananda, bhikkhu parinibbayeyya, apetthekacco bhikkhu na parinibbayeyya”ti.
mn106:10.7: “Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yenapetthekacco bhikkhu parinibbayeyya, apetthekacco bhikkhu na parinibbayeyya”ti?
mn106:10.9: ‘no cassa, no ca me siya; na bhavissati, na me bhavissati; yadatthi, yam bhutam—tam pajahami’ti.
mn106:10.11: So tam upekkham abhinandati, abhivadati, ajjhosaya titthati.
mn106:10.12: Tassa tam upekkham abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaya titthato tannissitam hoti vinnanam tadupadanam.
mn106:11.1: “Kaham pana so, bhante, bhikkhu upadiyamano upadiyati”ti?
mn106:11.3: “Upadanasettham kira so, bhante, bhikkhu upadiyamano upadiyati”ti?
mn106:12.2: ‘no cassa, no ca me siya; na bhavissati, na me bhavissati; yadatthi, yam bhutam—tam pajahami’ti.
mn106:12.4: So tam upekkham nabhinandati, nabhivadati, na ajjhosaya titthati.
mn106:12.5: Tassa tam upekkham anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato na tannissitam hoti vinnanam na tadupadanam.
mn106:13.2: Nissaya nissaya kira no, bhante, bhagavata oghassa nittharana akkhata.
mn106:13.5: ‘ye ca ditthadhammika kama, ye ca samparayika kama;
mn106:13.6: ya ca ditthadhammika kamasanna, ya ca samparayika kamasanna;
mn106:13.7: ye ca ditthadhammika rupa, ye ca samparayika rupa;
mn106:13.8: ya ca ditthadhammika rupasanna, ya ca samparayika rupasanna;
mn106:13.9: ya ca anenjasanna, ya ca akincannayatanasanna, ya ca nevasannanasannayatanasanna—
mn106:13.11: Etam amatam yadidam anupada cittassa vimokkho.
mn106:14.1: Iti, kho, ananda, desita maya anenjasappaya patipada, desita akincannayatanasappaya patipada, desita nevasannanasannayatanasappaya patipada, desita nissaya nissaya oghassa nittharana, desito ariyo vimokkho.
mn106:15.1: Yam kho, ananda, satthara karaniyam savakanam hitesina anukampakena anukampam upadaya, katam vo tam maya.
mn106:15.2: Etani, ananda, rukkhamulani, etani sunnagarani. Jhayathananda, ma pamadattha, ma paccha vippatisarino ahuvattha. Ayam vo amhakam anusasani’”ti.
mn106:15.4: Attamano ayasma anando bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
